item.title: index
item.description: Human Thriving Some humans want to thrive/flourish. Our definition of thriving: “the experience of joy, contentment, or positive well-being, combined with a sense that oneâ€™s life is good, meaningful, and worthwhile.” 1 Thriving is really just a fancy word for high well-being. I love the word thriving. I most associate the word with Good Ventures. 2 Well-being comprises a) short-term pleasant and unpleasant feelings and b) your overall satisfaction with your life.
